trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when an attempt is made to invoke an invalid target.
trans-unit.target: 表示尝试调用无效目标时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: A `TargetException` is thrown when an attempt is made to invoke a non-static method on a null object.
trans-unit.target: 当尝试对 null 对象调用非静态方法时，将引发 `TargetException`。

trans-unit.source: This may occur because the caller does not have access to the member, or because the target does not define the member, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是因为调用方没有访问成员，或者因为目标不会定义的成员，等等。

trans-unit.source: This exception is not included in the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the , but it is thrown by some members that are.
trans-unit.target: 此异常未包含在[.NET for Windows Store 应用](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912)或的详细信息，但它将引发的某些成员。

trans-unit.source: To catch the exception in that case, write a `catch` statement for <xref:System.Exception> instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要在这种情况下捕获异常，编写`catch`语句<xref:System.Exception>相反。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TargetException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TargetException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TargetException" /> class with an empty message and the root cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用空消息和异常的根本原因初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TargetException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The `InnerException` property is set to `null` and the HRESULT error code is set to COR_E_TARGET.
trans-unit.target: `InnerException`属性设置为`null`和 HRESULT 错误代码设置为 COR_E_TARGET。

trans-unit.source: `TargetException` inherits from the <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: `TargetException` 继承自<xref:System.Exception>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the properties of the `Exception` object as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数设置的属性`Exception`对象下表中所示。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> describing the reason why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 描述异常发生原因的 <see langword="String" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TargetException" /> class with the given message and the root cause exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定消息和根源异常初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TargetException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: `TargetException` inherits from the <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: `TargetException` 继承自<xref:System.Exception>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the properties of the `Exception` object as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数设置的属性`Exception`对象下表中所示。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The message string.
trans-unit.target: message 字符串。

trans-unit.source: The data for serializing or deserializing the object.
trans-unit.target: 用于串行化或反序列化对象的数据。

trans-unit.source: The source of and destination for the object.
trans-unit.target: 对象的源和目标。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TargetException" /> class with the specified serialization and context information.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的序列化和上下文信息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TargetException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>inner</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inner</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TargetException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TargetException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Reflection.TargetException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Reflection.TargetException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。
